basics.name: Vasilis Ethan Sarris
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: A Cypriot-American PhD Student in Computer Science with a wide variety of research interests

work.name: School of Computing and Information, University of Pittsburgh
highlights: Graded work and lead recitations for various courses in the Computer Science Department.

work.name: Advanced Data Management Technologies Lab, University of Pittsburgh
highlights: Extended work in Indoor-Outdoor Navigation by creating and implementing multiple novel path finding algorithms.
Published multiple First-author papers on these novel algorithms.

work.name: Kovashka Lab, University of Pittsburgh
highlights: Explored the effects of pre-processing the input of object recognition models (ResNet, AlexNet, etc.) in such a way that was more akin to the visual cortex.
Preformed domain generalization benchmarks on these models using the standard and modified inputs.

work.name: Learning Imaging & Family Experience Lab, University of Pittsburgh
highlights: Developed a robust, user-friendly, graph-based fMRI analysis pipeline for the Lab's PhD Students.
Developed multiple web-based tasks for large-scale Psychology studies.

work.name: 東澳國民小 (Dong'ao Elementary), Nan'ao Township, Yilan County, Taiwan
highlights: Taught English to 100+ elementary school children grades 1st-5th.
